chapters.title: Chapter 14: What a Veil Hides
chapters.info: Lidya, p. 324 (367)—Damane in service of Tuon. She appears to have the Talent of Foretelling—she was able to read Tuon's fortune, in a way, and was caned by her because Tuon did not like what she told her. Tuon later apologized, realizing that Lidya had only told the truth.
